metadata.title: CVE-2019-19206 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Dolibarr CRM/ERP 10.0.3 allows viewimage.php?file= Stored XSS due toJavaScript execution in an SVG image for a profile picture.

criterions.comment: dolibarr: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
